comment._content: This is on Fifth Avenue looking north from 41st Street - the NY Public Library is off to the left behind the viewing stands (anyone who happens to have a 2008 wall calendar titled "Old New York: photos from the Museum of the City of New York" can see an image from almost this exact spot in the current April picture.)
